name: tauri-plugin-mpv-api
description: A Tauri plugin to embed the mpv player in your app via JSON IPC.

scripts.build:mpv-examples: pnpm build:plugins && pnpm --filter tauri-plugin-mpv-example tauri build
scripts.build:libmpv-examples: pnpm build:plugins && pnpm --filter tauri-plugin-libmpv-example tauri build
scripts.example:mpv: pnpm build:plugins && cd examples/mpv-example && pnpm tauri dev
scripts.example:libmpv: pnpm build:plugins && cd examples/libmpv-example && pnpm tauri dev
